resources.string: Enter the following information to create your account.
I have read and agreed to the Terms and Conditions of the application.
These Terms and Conditions constitute a legally binding agreement made between you – RAMCaf user – and UGE, about your access and the use of our mobile application (“RAMCaf”).

RAMCaf is a mobile application that is used to track the seat availability inside the Asia Pacific College (APC) Cafeteria. We, the United Growth Engineers (UGE), created this application for the goal of lessening the number of people, looking for a place to sit, crowding the inside of APC Cafeteria . This application will help you see the status of each seat without personally going inside the cafeteria .
As a RAMCaf user, you must agree to these following terms:
1. Provided that you are allowed to use this application, you are required to register with the use of this application.
2. All registration information you submit must be true, accurate, current, and complete.
3. You are a member of the APC Community, using the APC Email Address as a credential in signing up in this application.
4. You agree to keep your email and password confidential and will be responsible for all use of your credentials.
5. UGE, founder of RAMCaf, the administrators, and the developers will not be disclosing any of the credentials given, for the user’s personal privacy.
6. It is mandatory to be responsible in scanning the QR Code provided in every seat for the proper tracking of its status.
7. You will not use this application for any illegal or unauthorized purpose.
8. Your use of this application will not violate any applicable law or regulation.

If you provide any information that is untrue, inaccurate, not current, or incomplete, we have the right to suspend or terminate your account and refuse any and all current or future use of the Application(or any portion thereof).

We care about data privacy and security. By using the Application, you agree to share your personal information with us. Please be advised the Application is hosted in the Philippines. If you access the Application from any other region of the world with laws or other requirements governing personal data collection, use, or disclosure that differ from applicable laws in the Philippines, then through your continued use of the Application or Services, you are transferring your data to the Philippines, and you expressly consent to have your data transferred to and processed in the Philippines.
Tap the camera to scan again
